title: Reproduction Textile, 1952
medium:
Medium: silk, rayon
Technique: compound satin; wide weft twill, weft-ribbed cloth
description: Deep golden yellow satin with widely spaced vertical repeat of lyre with swam heads and with leaf arabesque at base, (from Bony design 1920-36-99) alternating with five rosettes in widely spaced symmetrical arrangement. In yellow and golden brown in wide weft twill, cloth, weft-ribbed cloth, fancy cloth on gold satin ground. One selvage with blue stripe.

tombstone.epitaph:
Reproduction Textile, 1952.Medium: silk, rayon
Technique: compound satin; wide weft twill, weft-ribbed cloth. 1953-4-1.
